title: Lenovo Yoga Smart Tab with Google Assistant 4 GB RAM 64 GB ROM 10.1 inch with Wi-Fi+4G Tablet (Iron Grey)

product_specification.Model Name: Yoga Smart Tab with Google Assistant
product_specification.Processor Type: Qualcomm Snapdragon 439 Octa Core (4 x A53 at 2.0 GHz + 4 x A53 at 1.45 GHz)
product_specification.Operating Frequency: GSM: B2/B3/B5/B8, WCDMA: B1/B2/B3/B5 (B6/B19)/B8, 4G FDD LTE: B1/B2/B3/B4/B5 (B19)/B7/B8/B20, 4G TDD LTE: B38/B40
product_specification.Additional Features: Face Unlock Support, Waterproof IP52 Rating, 2 x 2 W Dual Powerful JBL Speakers, Google Assistant’s Ambient Mode, 3 x Digital Microphone Array, Built-in Kickstand with 4 Modes
product_specification.Sales Package: Tablet, Power Adapter (5 V/2 A), USB 2.0 Type C Cable, Quick Start Guide, User Manual, Warranty Card
product_specification.Other Camera Features: Auto Focus Rear Camera, Fixed Focus with Wide Angle 86 Degree Front Camera
product_specification.Other Connectivity Features: Bluetooth Support, 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz Dual Band Wireless Connectivity
product_specification.Other Display Features: Full HD LED Backlit Multi Touch IPS Display (with TDDI Technology, 320 nits Brightness, 70% Color Gamut)
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Tablet, 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.Multiple Modes: You can use this tab in different ways as per your convenience. Place it on its in-built kickstand to watch videos, tilt it to complete your work or hold it to read news, books or articles. Its 7000 mAh battery lets you use it for hours on end on a single, full charge.
product_description.Hands-free Experience: You can enjoy a hands-free experience by placing this tab on its kickstand and using the Google Assistant feature. Its triple digital microphones with far-field recognition help Google Assistant hear your voice even when you command from the far end of your room.
product_description.Smart Mode: This tab can be converted into a Google Smart Display, so you can stream music from various music apps or enjoy various videos on YouTube. You can also switch it into a Digital Photo frame by letting it display your favourite photos.
product_description.Google Assistant: With the Google Assistant feature, you can set reminders on your calendar, get directions on Google Maps and stay connected to your friends and family over Google Duo video calls.
product_description.Large Screen: It features a 25.65-cm IPS display with the TDDI technology to ensure responsive touch and an immersive viewing experience. It also reduces blue light emission, so you can watch content for hours on end without straining your eyes.
product_description.Hi-Fi Speakers: Its dual JBL Hi-Fi speakers powered by an amplifier and optimised by the Dolby Atmos technology produce clear and powerful audio, so you can enjoy your favourite tracks to the fullest.
product_description.Performance: Thanks to its 64 GB of ROM, 4 GB of RAM, a Qualcomm octa-core processor and the Android Pie operating system, this tab ensures lag-free and seamless performance.

Initially I was a bit scared about my decision to go for one. Once I received the package, I heard it out.
Pros.
1. Sound system is incredible.
2. Excellent display. No compromise on the quality.
3. Ample storage
4. Convenient design. Easy in terms of portablility
5. Battery life is good enough for a day.
6. Built is good. Provides good protection.
7. No complicated operations. Friendly user interface.
8. It's has got a lot of utility options which helps in almost all situations.

Cons.
1.The built in Google is not for everyone. It can be annoying most of the time.
2. Though the screen is good, cracks on the edge in case of any impact is probable.(screen guard and case highly recommend)
3. The processor of this device is the biggest disappointment. Was an ace during it's day, now it's pretty much outdated. The RAM compensates for the power, but chances of a lag cannot be eliminated.
4. It tends to be slippery most of the times.

It's a must go for those who have casual to moderate use, especially for commuting. Bulk use can lead to the device getting stuck. For the prince of 21,000 rupees, it is justified in terms of the sound system, screen quality and use. But not in terms of its processor.

Bought this for my wife. She used to watch her favorite shows on a mobile phone. For a better viewing experience, general browsing & Zoom calls I was looking for a suitable tab.

Apart from Ipads, other tabs in this price range have poor specs. They are low on RAM like Samsung Galaxy which is 3+32 and cost more. This has the added advantage of JBL speakers. Having bought it, there are no regrets.

The screen resolution is very good. Most streaming services like Netflix, Youtube, Hotstar render very well on this screen. The audio quality is also very good.

The outer surface has a rubberized finish which makes holding it very comfortable. Unlike Ipads with their shiny Aluminium surfaces you get scared of dropping them. The rear stand is very useful. You can put it on a table and watch while attending to other work. For other tabs you need to buy a case with stand to get the same level of functionality. So overall a very good package.

I bought it during the Big Savings Days and got a HDFC bank discount. Cost me less than 19K without any exchange.

If you need a decent tab for general purpose use, this is the best option. Far better value than Samsung or Ipads.
